channel.title: Welcome to my showcase! on Krzysztof Wilczyński

item.title: Projects
item.description: Unfortunately, most of the projects I’ve been professionally involved in cannot be cited on this page due to confidentiality agreements signed with my previous employers. However, this page will showcase my private, smaller projects. Vue.js Snake! This is a simple snake game inspired by mobile games from early 2000s. Help the snake to grow up by eating apples from the board. Use the fake phone buttons or real WASD or arrows to control.
